snippet: In the latest restrictions on aid agencies in the country, a senior official said the four groups had been asked to stop all projects in the east but could stay in the country.
abstract: Sudan expels four foreign aid groups from its restive eastern region because of failed projects.
lead_paragraph: In the latest restrictions on aid agencies in the country, a senior official said the four groups had been asked to stop all projects in the east but could stay in the country.
